thread.title: In Tucson, Bernie Sanders slams Donald Trump for calling immigrants criminals
thread.title_full: In Tucson, Bernie Sanders slams Donald Trump for calling immigrants criminals - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: In Tucson, Bernie Sanders slams Donald Trump for calling immigrants criminals
text: In a Friday night rally attended by at least 11, 000 adoring fans in Tucson, Arizona , presidential candidate Bernie Sanders skewered Donald Trump for what he described as racist vote-baiting, praised undocumented immigrants, slammed gun law
